nodes.text: Creative procrastinating was a topic of research at the University of Desultori. Author and scholar Aanxi Raanxi Laanxi chaired four subcommittees on creative procrastinating at that university.

Aanxi Raanxi Laanxi was first featured in a segment named "The Seminar Participants," written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that combines creature designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects with original text by Carrau. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
